trans-unit.source: Welcome to Microsoft RMS!
trans-unit.target: Welcome to Microsoft RMS!

trans-unit.source: You’re probably reading this because someone sent you a protected document and you clicked the sign in link in the email message, or your favorite search engine sent you here.
trans-unit.target: You’re probably reading this because someone sent you a protected document and you clicked the sign in link in the email message, or your favorite search engine sent you here.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Rights Management (RMS) helps the sender of a document protect it from people who do not need to see it, or should not see it.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Rights Management (RMS) helps the sender of a document protect it from people who do not need to see it, or should not see it.

trans-unit.source: The sender specifies who can access the document, and what they can do with it (for example, view only, print, etc).
trans-unit.target: The sender specifies who can access the document, and what they can do with it (for example, view only, print, etc).

trans-unit.source: Quick start
trans-unit.target: Quick start

trans-unit.source: To view a protected document, you must sign in and have a supported application:
trans-unit.target: To view a protected document, you must sign in and have a supported application:

trans-unit.source: Sign in <link><linkText>here</linkText><title></title></link> to get a free RMS account.
trans-unit.target: Sign in <link><linkText>here</linkText><title></title></link> to get a free RMS account.

trans-unit.source: If your company already has RMS, we’ll let you know.
trans-unit.target: If your company already has RMS, we’ll let you know.

trans-unit.source: Download the RMS application for your device by selecting the right icon on <link><linkText>this page</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Download the RMS application for your device by selecting the right icon on <link><linkText>this page</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For Windows computers, you must be a local administrator (current limitation).
trans-unit.target: For Windows computers, you must be a local administrator (current limitation).

trans-unit.source: That’s it.
trans-unit.target: That’s it.

trans-unit.source: You’re now ready to open protected files.
trans-unit.target: You’re now ready to open protected files.

trans-unit.source: Just go back to the original email and open the attachment.
trans-unit.target: Just go back to the original email and open the attachment.

trans-unit.source: In your email, you might see two files of the same name.
trans-unit.target: In your email, you might see two files of the same name.

trans-unit.source: They are the same except that one of them is a protected PDF file (.ppdf file name extension) that you can open on all platforms when you use our free RMS sharing application.
trans-unit.target: They are the same except that one of them is a protected PDF file (.ppdf file name extension) that you can open on all platforms when you use our free RMS sharing application.

trans-unit.source: To open the protected Office file, you must use an application that supports RMS.
trans-unit.target: To open the protected Office file, you must use an application that supports RMS.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this means Office 2013 or Office 2010 running on Windows.
trans-unit.target: Currently, this means Office 2013 or Office 2010 running on Windows.

trans-unit.source: Future versions of Office on mobile platforms will support RMS.
trans-unit.target: Future versions of Office on mobile platforms will support RMS.

trans-unit.source: Keep informed about updates via <link><linkText>@TheRMSGuy</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Keep informed about updates via <link><linkText>@TheRMSGuy</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Want more help?
trans-unit.target: Want more help?

trans-unit.source: Our <link><linkText>desktop</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>mobile</linkText><title></title></link> application FAQs
trans-unit.target: Our <link><linkText>desktop</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>mobile</linkText><title></title></link> application FAQs

trans-unit.source: Our general web site: <link><linkText>www.microsoft.com/RMS</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Our general web site: <link><linkText>www.microsoft.com/RMS</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Our blog site: <link><linkText>http://blogs.technet.com/b/rms</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Our blog site: <link><linkText>http://blogs.technet.com/b/rms</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Our Twitter feed: <link><linkText>https://twitter.com/TheRMSGuy</linkText><title></title></link> (low volume, on-topic posts only)
trans-unit.target: Our Twitter feed: <link><linkText>https://twitter.com/TheRMSGuy</linkText><title></title></link> (low volume, on-topic posts only)

trans-unit.source: Protecting your own documents
trans-unit.target: Protecting your own documents

trans-unit.source: Windows users can also send protected documents for free.
trans-unit.target: Windows users can also send protected documents for free.

trans-unit.source: It’s quite simple.
trans-unit.target: It’s quite simple.

trans-unit.source: To learn more, check out our <link><linkText>user guide</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To learn more, check out our <link><linkText>user guide</linkText><title></title></link>.
